definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: The books are in orderly rows on the shelves.
sentences.chinese: 书整齐有序地排列在书架上。

sentences.english: There, I've said it -- it feels so good to have that off my chest.
sentences.chinese: 在此，我已经说过能够脱离开书架让我感觉非常好。

sentences.english: The continuos high book shelf integrates lighting which position can be adjusted to the need.
sentences.chinese: 连续的高书架集成照明灯，灯的位置能够按需调节。

sentences.english: I told him about the Dewey Decimal System for shelving books.
sentences.chinese: 我给他讲图书架的杜威十字分类法。

sentences.english: Faster than a turbo-powered broomstick, Harry Potter has started flying off the shelves.
sentences.chinese: 哈利波特开始飞下书架，速度比涡轮驱动的扫帚还快。

sentences.english: He made room on his shelf for me to put some books.
sentences.chinese: 他在书架子上腾了些地方，让我放几本书。

sentences.english: The vase crashed when it fell off the bookcase.
sentences.chinese: 那个花瓶从书架上掉了下来，摔碎了。

sentences.english: He reached down the atlas from the top shelf .
sentences.chinese: 他伸手将地图册从顶屋书架上取下。

sentences.english: Terry: She's so prim and stiff, like a bookcase.
sentences.chinese: 她太呆板，僵硬了，像个书架。

sentences.english: When you've finished with the book put it back on the shelf.
sentences.chinese: 你看完这本书后，把它放回书架上。

sentences.english: Beside four tables all books are on shelves in order.
sentences.chinese: 除了四张桌子外，所有的书都在书架上。

sentences.english: The whole length of book shelves is 275 km.
The bookcases were made by a designer friend.
sentences.chinese: 书架是我的一个设计师朋友做的。

sentences.english: Persky tucked the bills in his pants pocket and turned toward his bookcase.
sentences.chinese: 庞先生把钱塞进裤袋然后转身向着他的书架。

sentences.english: But last time I looked, the box-by-the-bookcase was empty.
sentences.chinese: 但是我也检查过书架旁边那个盒子，是空的。

sentences.english: We need a carpenter to detach this bookshelf from the wall.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一名木匠将书架从墙上拆下来。

definition: small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
